title: Just a quick question about the Leblanc update ult
body:
Is her Mimic (R) Shadow of the Rose (her thing that spawns a close anywhere on the map) cooldown reduced by CDR?

I'm asking because it has a separate cooldown from her normal ult.

replies.body: At first I thought it was a little strange that there weren't any comments here to insult me.  Then I clicked back in here and there aren't even any downvotes?  Is this really the gameplay board?
Cooldown reduction will not lower its cooldown at all.
Wait it lowers her mimic ult cooldown? I know it lowers her normal ult cooldown of course.
yep, scales down to 66s with 45% cdr (which I'd recommend) and 16.6s for the "normal" r

Thank you so much :)

That was exactly what I was looking for.
Nice I didnt know that, no wonder I had my mimic R every 3 normal ults, I always run 45%cdr rather than the extra magic pen.

Yep and I hope it stays like this :3
And I like you for going full cdr xD
Do you play with cdr runes and go Morello and Abyssal/Zhonyas/Hextech-Dash-Thing or do you play with three cdr items without cdr runes?

I go morellos and protobelt with 10 cdr rune page, and I have a crazy build that I use often, And it still kills, I take 1 cdr item that gives 10%, liandrys, sorcsm rabs, ludens, and rod of ages with 30% cdr runes.

hm, I don't like the tanky version, especially because I know it is going to be nerfed in some way (for obvious reasons). Additionally ROA is too much of a lategame item, and LeBlanc is still early-midgame oriented xD
but the resistances of Abyssal/Zhonyas were always nice, and the utility the give synergizes well with her kit. That was the reason I was asking, and at the moment we don't have any statistics about what is the best itembuild...
